snippet: A judge is accused of having an affair with his secretary and trying to frame her husband for crimes including drug possession, larceny and assault.
abstract: West Virginia Judge Michael Thornsbury is accused of having an affair with his secretary and trying to frame her husband for multiple crimes; is charged with conspiracy and faces up to 20 years in prison if convicted.
lead_paragraph: A judge is accused of having an affair with his secretary and trying to frame her husband for crimes including drug possession, larceny and assault.

headline.main: West Virginia: Charges Against Judge Linked to Affair
